name: The Cost of Death - Free For iPhone & iPod!
name_original: The Cost of Death - Free For iPhone & iPod!
description:
Get ready for a real adventure!

What this game is all about? Very simple. Do not get hit by falling objects. With the "tilt to move" behavior, you'll enjoy collecting points to buy specials in the game! It can get really addictive! When you buy specials, they'll help you progress and make it more fun!

Get this app on your device now! It's FREE!
